title: (x) AFLAC website - Today Sans {Stephen}
content:
Hi,

I look for the font used for the AFLAC logo ( [http://www.aflacny.com/us/en/Default.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045710/http:/www.aflacny.com/us/en/Default.aspx "http://www.aflacny.com/us/en/Default.aspx")). I also like the oblique version of this typeface: It looks friendly :-) Can anybody help?

Bye, Oliver
author: olvradam

comments.content: The "Aflac" portion of the logo is custom, but [Today Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045710/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=today%20sans) is used throughout the site, including the " [New York](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045710/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=SG.119022.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=New+York&sampleSize=18)".
